mentions.context: 7 GROBID is a machine-learning library, with a particular focus on technical and scientic publications, for extracting, parsing, and re-structuring raw documents such as PDFs into structured TEI-encoded documents.

The GermaParl R data package, a corpus that includes "all plenary protocols that were published by the German Bundestag between February 1996 and December 2016" (Blätte and Blessing 2018, 810), has been developed (Blätte 2017a, Blätte 2017b).
The open-source software TXM 21 (Heiden, Magué, and Pincemin 2010) used in this project indeed proceeds to language-specic part-of-speech tagging when a corpus is imported.

In particular, we used the GROBID software suite, 7 which provides a relatively ecient transformation process from PDFs to a decent TEI format, although not fully compliant with the target encoding scheme.
